title: Vengo Die Gemusekuche
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out
description: Small vegetarian cafe-style restaurant in Bremen's shopping and food mile Das Viertel. Has a large salad bar, and offers a weekly menu of two soups and two main dishes (e.g., curries), several desserts, hot and cold drinks. Everything on menu is vegan, but optional dairy cheese and milk are available. Seating is rather limited.
